entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
